email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Would you consider $50.75 per ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I can bring the freight rate down to $51.25 per ton, but that’s the best I can do. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $51.25 per ton is acceptable. Can we confirm the laycan as 15-20 October and the demurrage rate at $15,000 per day? If so, we can proceed with the fixture. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. Yes, the laycan is confirmed as 15-20 October, and the demurrage rate is $15,000 per day. I’ll send over the fixture recap shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best regards, Sarah
